welcome.subtitle: Let's build your perfect operations platform
welcome.helper: This will take about 30 minutes. We'll ask questions about your business to create a customized workspace.

company_intro_nlp.subtitle: What do you make? Where are you located? What's your capacity?
company_intro_nlp.helper: Describe your business in a few sentences. We'll extract key information automatically.
company_intro_nlp.placeholder: We are a denim manufacturing facility in Istanbul. We produce 10,000 garments per month across 2 production lines with a team of 45 people...

company_confirm_extracted.helper: We extracted this information from your description. Click any card to edit.

company_name.helper: This will appear throughout your workspace.

company_logo.helper: Your logo will appear in the header and reports.

company_size.prompt: How many people work at your company?
company_size.helper: Select the range that best fits your team size.

company_facilities.prompt: Do you operate from a single site or multiple locations?

operations_model_nlp.subtitle: How do you operate? Make-to-order, make-to-stock, or both?
operations_model_nlp.helper: Tell us about your production model and how you handle orders.
operations_model_nlp.placeholder: We work on custom orders. Each order is unique and we start production only after receiving customer specifications. Lead time is typically 2-3 weeks...

operations_shifts.prompt: How many shifts do you run per day?

operations_seasonality.prompt: Do you have seasonal demand spikes?
operations_seasonality.helper: Some businesses experience higher demand during certain months.

operations_peak_months.prompt: Which months are your peak season?
operations_peak_months.helper: Select all months when demand is typically higher.

items_types_nlp.prompt: What types of items do you produce or manage?
items_types_nlp.helper: List the categories of products, materials, or assets you work with.
items_types_nlp.placeholder: We make jeans, jackets, t-shirts, and other denim apparel. We also manage raw fabric, zippers, buttons, and other components...

items_sku_builder.prompt: Let's define what makes up your items
items_sku_builder.subtitle: Build your item structure
items_sku_builder.helper: Start with the basics (name, code, quantity) and add custom attributes that matter to you.

items_complexity.prompt: Do your items have components or sub-parts?
items_complexity.helper: For example, a jacket might have fabric, zippers, buttons, and thread as components.

items_components_builder.helper: For each component type, specify its attributes.

items_tracking_level.helper: Choose the level of granularity for your tracking.

options.label: Per unit
options.description: Each item has a unique ID (serial number)

options.label: Per batch
options.description: Groups of items tracked together (lot numbers)

options.label: Per order
options.description: Track by order only (no individual IDs)

workflow_process_nlp.prompt: Describe your production process from start to finish
workflow_process_nlp.helper: List the stages items go through. We'll create a workflow for you.
workflow_process_nlp.placeholder: We receive fabric, cut patterns, sew garments, wash and finish them, do QA inspection, then package and ship...

workflow_stages_confirm.prompt: Review and edit your workflow stages
workflow_stages_confirm.helper: Drag to reorder, click to edit details, or add/remove stages.

workflow_quality_control.prompt: Do you have quality control checkpoints?
workflow_quality_control.helper: Quality checkpoints ensure items meet standards at key stages.

sites_want_mapping.prompt: Do you want to map your physical facility?
sites_want_mapping.helper: Floor plans help visualize where work happens and track items by location.

sites_floor_builder.helper: Click zones to designate areas: Production, QA, Storage, Shipping, Office.

sites_multiple_floors.prompt: Do you have multiple floors or buildings?
sites_multiple_floors.helper: You can map up to 5 separate floors.

teams_structure_nlp.helper: Tell us about your departments, roles, and how your team is organized.
teams_structure_nlp.placeholder: We have an operations team that handles production, a quality team for inspections, warehouse team for receiving and shipping, and admin team for planning...

teams_floor_app.prompt: Will you have floor workers scanning QR codes?
teams_floor_app.helper: Enable the mobile Floor App for workers to scan items and update status.

integrations_existing_systems.prompt: Do you use an ERP, MRP, or other business system?
integrations_existing_systems.helper: We can integrate with your existing tools.

integrations_system_selection.helper: Select all that apply. We'll prioritize integrations based on your needs.

integrations_api_access.prompt: Do you need API access or webhooks?
integrations_api_access.helper: API access lets you build custom integrations.

analytics_audience.helper: Select all that apply. We'll customize views for each audience.

analytics_metrics_nlp.prompt: What metrics matter most to you?
analytics_metrics_nlp.helper: List the KPIs you track or want to track.
analytics_metrics_nlp.placeholder: On-time delivery, defect rate, throughput, capacity utilization, WIP age...

analytics_chart_preference.prompt: What type of charts do you prefer?

options.label: Trend charts
options.description: Line and area charts for tracking over time

options.label: Comparison charts
options.description: Bar and column charts for comparing values

options.label: Tables
options.description: Detailed data in rows and columns

analytics_report_frequency.prompt: How often do you need reports?

playbooks_auto_tasks.prompt: For each order, should we auto-create purchasing and QC tasks?
playbooks_auto_tasks.helper: Playbooks automate routine tasks when orders are created.

playbooks_task_selection.prompt: Which tasks should be created automatically?
playbooks_task_selection.helper: Select the tasks that apply to your process.

gap_filling.subtitle: We need a few more pieces of information
gap_filling.helper: These details are required to complete your setup.

review.helper: Check everything looks correct. You can go back to edit any section.

review_confirm.subtitle: This will take about 20 seconds
review_confirm.helper: You can always customize further after generation.
